actions.text: Added Blood particle Effects (Located everywhere the player takes damage)

children.text: When the arrow hits anything designated as a wall or tiledwall, spawn the arrow hit particle effect, set the angle right, and then destroy the arrow.

When the arrow hits an enemy, spawn the hit particle effect, then subtract the attack power + brittle damage from their health, set the enemies to their hurt animation over and over again, and subtract the enemies it can hit (piercing variable) by 1.
If the enemiesitcanhit is greater than two, subtract 1 from that variable.
If the enemiesitcanhit is less than 2, destroy the arrow on collision
If the element is electric, spawn the zap radius, and destroy it after .02 seconds. This will hurt all enemies within the zap radius (and the enemy hit a second time).

children.title: Piercing Shot
children.description: Shots go through more than one enemy

children.title: Dash
children.description: Press Space Bar to Dash forward, leaving a trail of elements behind you

children.description: Just fires one shot in the direction you're facing

children.text: When the enemy is brittle, their move speed is reduced by 20% for 5 seconds

children.title: Sharaglakesh
children.description: Orc Shaman who throws acid flasks at the player, sometimes the acid does a DoT effect, sometimes it pushes the player back

parameters.audio-file: Boss 1 Evil Laugh Play at -5 DB

children.title: Bob
children.description:
This bastard was a cultist all along. Bob stabs the player at the beginning as a cheap shot, and every once in a while bob will try to dash towards the player and stab them.

Player has reduced visibility due to a shadow vignette affecting the screen.

parameters.audio-file: Boss 2 Evil Laugh Play at - 5 DB

children.title: Xanesh
children.description:
The grim reaper wields a heavy 2-handed scythe and will use a mix of melee and ranged magical attacks at you.

Scythe melee strike will insta kill

Shoots out blades that ricochet off walls that will hurt the player if they stand in them
